org.apache.tomcat.websocket.pojo

类 PojoEndpointServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.websocket.Endpoint
      • org.apache.tomcat.websocket.pojo.PojoEndpointBase
        • org.apache.tomcat.websocket.pojo.PojoEndpointServer

  • public class PojoEndpointServer
extends PojoEndpointBase
    Wrapper class for instances of POJOs annotated with ServerEndpoint so they appear as standard Endpoint instances.

      • onOpen

        public void onOpen(Session session,
                   EndpointConfig endpointConfig)
        从类复制的说明: Endpoint
        Event that is triggered when a new session starts.
        指定者:
        onOpen 在类中 Endpoint
        参数:
        session - The new session.
        endpointConfig - The configuration with which the Endpoint was configured.
